text: And Adoni-bezek said, Threescore and ten kings, having their thumbs and their great toes cut off, gathered their meat under my table: as I have done, so God hath requited me. And they brought him to Jerusalem, and there he died.1.7 their thumbsâ€¦: Heb. the thumbs of their hands and of their feet1.7 gathered: or, gleaned
